title: Pfizer-BioNTech To Test Combined Covid And Flu Vaccine
author: AFP
description: Pfizer-BioNTech said Thursday they will test a combined coronavirus and influenza vaccine, which could potentially pave the way for better inoculation uptake for both illnesses.
